privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.introduction: Lingosource Ltd, incorporated in the UK (Company Number 16688081), trading as 'Lingosource', provides outsourced call centre solutions including customer support, sales assistance, and administrative tasks. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your personal and non-personal information when you use our Services.
privacyPolicy.agreementNotice: By using our Services, you agree to this Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, you should stop using our Services.
privacyPolicy.compliance: This Privacy Policy complies with UK Data Protection Act 2018, UK GDPR, PECR, and, where applicable, EU GDPR.

subsections.title: 1.1 Information You Provide Directly
content: Online forms, demos, billing, and payments
Personal details such as name, address, email, phone, billing info, and business details

subsections.title: 1.2 Information Collected Automatically
content: Usage data: pages visited, actions, date/time

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
content: Provide and manage Services (account setup, call handling, support)
Send service updates and optional marketing

sharingInfo.title: 3. How We Share Your Information
content: With service providers (payments, hosting, CRM, analytics)

rights.title: 5. Your Privacy Rights
content: Access, correct, or delete your data
UK/EU rights: data portability, restrict processing, object to use, complain to Data Protection Authority

children.title: 6. Children's Privacy
content: Services not directed to children under 18
Immediate deletion if data collected without consent

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
content: Performance cookies: analytics and site improvement
Marketing cookies: targeted ads and offers
Cookie controls: browser settings, opt-out tools, consent banner

retention.title: 10. Data Retention
content: Data kept only as long as necessary

transfers.title: 11. International Data Transfers
content: Data may be transferred outside UK/EEA (e.g., US via Stripe/PayPal)

marketing.title: 12. Marketing Communications & Opt-Out
content: Opt-out via unsubscribe link or contacting us
Service-related emails still sent even if marketing is declined

changes.title: 13. Changes to Privacy Policy
content: Continued use = acceptance of new policy

contact.title: 14. Complaints and Contact Information
content: Complaints: ICO or local Data Protection Authority
